TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit MediaFormat extends Java.Lang.Object

Docs.summary: Encapsulates the information describing the format of media data, be it audio or video.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Creates an empty MediaFormat

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool ContainsKey(string name) cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns true iff a key of the given name exists in the format.

MemberSignature.Value: public static Android.Media.MediaFormat CreateAudioFormat (string mime, int sampleRate, int channelCount);
.method public static hidebysig class Android.Media.MediaFormat CreateAudioFormat(string mime, int32 sampleRate, int32 channelCount) cil managed

Docs.param: The mime type of the content.
The sampling rate of the content.
The number of audio channels in the content.
Docs.summary: Creates a minimal audio format.

MemberSignature.Value: public static Android.Media.MediaFormat CreateSubtitleFormat (string mime, string language);
.method public static hidebysig class Android.Media.MediaFormat CreateSubtitleFormat(string mime, string language) cil managed

Docs.param: The mime type of the content.

The language of the content, using either ISO 639-1 or 639-2/T codes. Specify null or "und" if language information is only included in the content. (This will also work if there are multiple language tracks in the content.)
Docs.summary: Creates a minimal subtitle format.

MemberSignature.Value: public static Android.Media.MediaFormat CreateVideoFormat (string mime, int width, int height);
.method public static hidebysig class Android.Media.MediaFormat CreateVideoFormat(string mime, int32 width, int32 height) cil managed

Docs.param: The mime type of the content.
The width of the content (in pixels)
The height of the content (in pixels)
Docs.summary: Creates a minimal video format.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class Java.Nio.ByteBuffer GetByteBuffer(string name) cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns the value of a ByteBuffer key.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool GetFeatureEnabled(string feature) cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns whether a feature is to be enabled (true) or disabled (false).
Docs.exception: if the feature was neither set to be enabled nor to be disabled.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance float32 GetFloat(string name) cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns the value of a float key.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance int32 GetInteger(string name) cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns the value of an integer key.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance int64 GetLong(string name) cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns the value of a long key.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance string GetString(string name) cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns the value of a string key.
A key describing the attenuation factor allowing to adapt the dynamics of the output to the actual listening requirements.
A key describing the boost factor allowing to adapt the dynamics of the output to the actual listening requirements.
A key describing the selection of the heavy compression profile for DRC.
A key describing a gain to be applied so that the output loudness matches the Target Reference Level.
A key describing the target reference level that was assumed at the encoder for calculation of attenuation gains for clipping prevention.
A key describing the maximum number of channels that can be output by the AAC decoder.
A key describing the AAC profile to be used (AAC audio formats only).
A key describing the AAC SBR mode to be used (AAC audio formats only).
A key describing the audio session ID of the AudioTrack associated to a tunneled video codec.
A key describing the bitrate in bits/sec.
A key describing the desired bitrate mode to be used by an encoder.
A key describing the capture rate of a video format in frames/sec.
A key describing the number of channels in an audio format.
A key describing the channel composition of audio content.
A key describing the color format of the content in a video format.
A key describing the encoding complexity.
A key describing the duration (in microseconds) of the content.
A key describing the FLAC compression level to be used (FLAC audio format only).
A key describing the frame rate of a video format in frames/sec.
A key describing the height of the content in a video format.
A key describing the frequency of I frames expressed in secs between I frames.
A key mapping to a value of 1 if the content is AAC audio and audio frames are prefixed with an ADTS header.
A key for boolean AUTOSELECT behavior for the track.
A key for boolean DEFAULT behavior for the track.
A key for the FORCED field for subtitle tracks.
A key describing the language of the content, using either ISO 639-1 or 639-2/T codes.
A key describing the maximum expected height of the content in a video decoder format, in case there are resolution changes in the video content.
A key describing the maximum size in bytes of a buffer of data described by this MediaFormat.
A key describing the maximum expected width of the content in a video decoder format, in case there are resolution changes in the video content.
A key describing the mime type of the MediaFormat.
A key describing the desired profile to be used by an encoder.

If specified when configuring a video decoder rendering to a surface, causes the decoder to output "blank", i.e. black frames to the surface when stopped to clear out any previously displayed contents.
Applies only when configuring a video encoder in "surface-input" mode.
A key describing the sample rate of an audio format.
A key describing the temporal layering schema.
A key describing the width of the content in a video format.
MIME type for CEA-608 closed caption data.
MIME type for WebVTT subtitle data.

.method public hidebysig instance void SetLong(string name, int64 value) cil managed

Docs.summary: Sets the value of a long key.

MemberSignature.Value: public void SetString (string name, string value);
.method public hidebysig instance void SetString(string name, string value) cil managed

Docs.summary: Sets the value of a string key.
